lyrics:
12 contributorsstarting over lyricsintro
oh oh
oh oh

verse 1
hes all right hes all wrong
hes a player hes a dog
hes my friend hes my foe
i just cant leave him i cant go
i got my reasons got my pride
i got these kids we got these ties
we had this love i had these dreams
im falling apart at the seams

prechorus
hes my man when were at home
and it cant hurt if i dont know
all his secrets all his lies
i just keep pushing out my mind
i wish that everybody would stop judging
pointing fingers its cutting
my heart is broken up im open and feeling so bad
ive gotta make decisions
im strong but who am i kidding
ill be okay but this love is tearing me in half
see jennifer lopez liveget tickets as low as 100you might also likechorus
nobody wants to be the one breaking up
im down on my knees im praying for this love
im in love im in love im still in love im still in love
i just dont think just dont think that its enough its enough
i can feel it getting colder
im afraid of starting over

verse 2
he makes me feel like a child
he makes me happy when he smiles
he makes me sad he makes me mad
i wanna give him all i have
and i have tried to treat him good
show support like i should
did my part hes my heart
and ive been faithful from the start

prechorus
hes my man when were at home
and it cant hurt if i dont know
all his secrets all his lies
i just keep pushing out my mind
i wish that everybody would stop judging
pointing fingers its cutting
my heart is broken up im open and feeling so bad
ive gotta make decisions
im strong but who am i kidding
ill be okay but this love is tearing me in half
chorus
nobody wants to be the one breaking up
im down on my knees im praying for his love
im in love im in love im still in love im still in love
i just dont think just dont think that its enough its enough
i can feel it getting colder
im afraid of starting over

bridge
oh oh
oh oh
to save this life we built together
we need another chance
its like my whole life and my existence
he holds in his hands in his hands

chorus
nobody wants to be the one breaking up oh yeah
im down on my knees down on my knees im praying for his love for his love yeah
im in love im in love im still in love im still in love
i just dont think just dont think that its enough its enough
i can feel it getting colder
the time has come for starting over201embed
